title: EuroleagueBasketball
text: euroleague_basketball dataset includes information sourced publicly available basketball records Wikipedia. cleaned structured easy use R.

title: EuroleagueBasketball
text: can install development version package directly GitHub:
code: # Install devtools if not already installed install.packages("devtools")  # Install the package from GitHub devtools::install_github("natanast/EuroleagueBasketball")  # Load data library(EuroleagueBasketball) data(euroleague_basketball)

title: EuroleagueBasketball
text: EuroleagueBasketball R package provides data Euroleague basketball teams, including home cities, arenas, capacities, historical performance Final Four. dataset useful basketball analysis, sports enthusiasts, data visualization projects. ’s quick look data:
code: library(EuroleagueBasketball)  head(euroleague_basketball, 5) ##                        Team       Home city                         Arena ## 1              Anadolu Efes        Istanbul Basketball Development Center ## 2                  Baskonia Vitoria-Gasteiz                   Buesa Arena ## 3             Bayern Munich          Munich                    SAP Garden ## 4 Crvena zvezda Meridianbet        Belgrade                Belgrade Arena ## 5          Dubai Basketball           Dubai               Coca-Cola Arena ##     Capacity Last season              Country FinalFour_Appearances Titles_Won ## 1 10,000[22]         6th               Turkey                     5          2 ## 2 15,431[24]        14th                Spain                     0          0 ## 3 11,500[25]         9th              Germany                     0          0 ## 4 18,386[26]        10th               Serbia                     0          0 ## 5     17,000           — United Arab Emirates                     0          0 ##   Years_of_FinalFour_Appearances Years_of_Titles_Won ## 1   2000, 2001, 2019, 2021, 2022          2021, 2022 ## 2                                                    ## 3                                                    ## 4                                                    ## 5

title: Euroleague Basketball Teams Data — euroleague_basketball
text: dataset containing information Euroleague basketball teams, home cities, arenas, performance competition.

title: Euroleague Basketball Teams Data — euroleague_basketball
text: data frame 23 rows 11 columns: Team Name basketball team Home city City team based Arena Name team's arena Capacity Seating capacity arena Season team's performance current season Last season team's performance last season Country Country team located FinalFour_Appearances Number times team reached Euroleague Final Four Titles_Won Number Euroleague titles won team Years_of_FinalFour_Appearances Years team reached Final Four Years_of_Titles_Won Years team won Euroleague title
